title: Manglerud
text:
Manglerud () is a borough in the <a href="%C3%98stensj%C3%B8">Østensjø</a> district of <a href="Oslo">Oslo</a>, <a href="Norway">Norway</a>. Manglerud was built in the 1960s as a suburb to Oslo, connected by the "<a href="Oslo%20T-bane">Oslo T-bane</a>" <a href="rapid%20transit">metro</a> system.
Sport.
Ice hockey.
The suburb is perhaps most known for its <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> team, Manglerud Star, which plays in the <a href="GET-ligaen">GET-ligaen</a>, the highest level of Norwegian hockey. They are two times Norwegian champions, in 1977 and in 1978.
